EmailTemplate.description: List of discounted new and used parts
EmailTemplate.name: 202008_EMEAI_ATR_HAT_FGI_Gated_MC.202009_EMEAI_FGI_Discounted_Parts_New and used
EmailTemplate.subject: List of discounted parts available for download
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in the Honeywell Discounted Spares Sale.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_Discounted Parts_New %26 Used_Nov.xlsx]]> to access the list of discounted parts. Please note that this is a limited period offer and parts are subject to availability, on a first come, first served basis, on new orders only. The list of discounted parts is meant for limited circulation. You are advised not to share the list/link with people outside your organization.
Please keep the list of parts you need ready, as we will contact you shortly.
